one of the best hacknslash arpgs out there destructable enviromentals smooth as butter gameplay works well with kbmouse or controller voiced by the voice actor who plays geralt in the witcher game series a ton of content and replayability

even after years of not playing it victor vran is still a blast the gameplay is simple yet satisfying with occasional funny moments that break the tension and keep things fresh the artwork is fantastic giving the game a unique and atmospheric look its one of those games that just puts you in a good mood  fun fastpaced and full of style highly recommended for anyone who enjoys action rpgs that dont take themselves too seriously
